title: Champion Selection
body: When I went to make a Summoner's Rift Blind Pick match I joined one and 0 champions came up NONE. So I didnt know what to do, the time ran up and it said that i left in champion selection? Please Help

replies.body:
Sometimes that can happen when your network is trying to grab the list of champions to display from our servers, but for some reason, it's never able to get that data. Since it doesn't get a response, it never shows any champions so then you are left with nothing to pick. 

Let's make sure that your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) are configured in the best way for League to run, and make sure to test those changes in a custom or practice game. Hit me back up and let me know how that helps!
